properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT(ROOM_NO) ,ROOM_TITLE ,ROOM_INFO ,GMEM_NO FROM ROOM JOIN VISIT USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND GMEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO ,ROOM_NO ,VISIT_DT ,VISIT_CODE FROM VISIT WHERE VISIT_CODE = ?
SELECT MEM_NICK, VISIT_DT, ROOM_NO FROM VISIT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE VISIT_CODE = 1
